query.queryString: create table mycine(mv_num smallint auto_increment primary key, mv_title varchar(300),mv_poster varchar(200), mv_director varchar(50),mv_opendate varchar(100))
UPDATE mycine SET mv_poster = 'Decision_to_Leave.jpg' WHERE (mv_num = 6) AND (mv_poster = '20231024122217Decision_to_Leave.jpg')
UPDATE mycine SET mv_poster = 'Intimate_STrangers.jpg' WHERE (mv_num = 7) AND (mv_poster = '20231024122353Intimate_STrangers.jpg')
UPDATE mycine SET mv_poster = 'Elemental.jpg' WHERE (mv_num = 8) AND (mv_poster = '20231024123942Elemental.jpg')
delete from mycine
UPDATE mycine SET mv_title = '엘리멘탈' WHERE (mv_num = 10) AND (mv_title = '엘리멘')
DELETE FROM mycine WHERE (mv_num = 13)
create table bootmember(num smallint auto_increment primary key, name varchar(20),id varchar(20), pass varchar(30), photo varchar(200),addr varchar(50), email varchar(50), gaipday datetime)
drop table bootmember

create table bootmember(num smallint auto_increment primary key, name varchar(20),id varchar(20), pass varchar(30), photo varchar(200),hp varchar(20), addr varchar(50), email varchar(50), gaipday datetime)
insert into bootmember values(null,'이수연','angel','1234','b8.png','010-111-1111','제주시 서귀포구','angel@sist.com',now())
select count(*) from bootmember where id='angel'
DELETE FROM bootmember WHERE (num = 2)

create table memboard(num smallint auto_increment primary key, name varchar(20),myid varchar(30),subject varchar(300), content varchar(3000),uploadfile varchar(500), readcount smallint default 0,writeday datetime)
select * from member order by num
select * from member order by num desc
select * from member order by num desc limit 0,2
select max(num) from member
DELETE FROM memboard WHERE (num = 3)
DELETE FROM memboard WHERE (num = 2)
